name: Ring of Basilius
description: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

abilities.name: Basilius Aura
abilities.description: Increases the mana regeneration of nearby allies.
notes: Multiple identical instances of Basilius Aura do not stack, regardless of source. Stacks with upgraded versions of the aura.
Can regenerate up to 60 mana in one minute.

additionalInfo: With Basilius Aura, the item grants a total of 1.5 mana regeneration to the wielder.
